name: Ch.5BaseConvo4
_source: speak;Ross;Wow!|Look at this town!|It's so big!|There are so many shops here!
speak;Colm;Don't get too excited there, kid.|This isn't that big of a town!
speak;Ross;Hey!|I'm not a kid!|You don't even look that much older than me!|You're that Colm guy, right?|I heard you've been stealing stuff!
speak;Colm;Hey!|I've been stealing stuff from the bad guys!|No need to get mad at me!|I'm on your side!
speak;Ross;Really, now?|How can you steal while on the battlefield?
speak;Colm;Now that's a great question, friend!|You see, you've got to be quick, smart, and light!|Most importantly: don't let them see you. Ever.
speak;Colm;It's fine, Neimi!|I was going to get you some jerky with the money I'll make from all this stuff!
speak;Ross;Ooh, jerky!|Now you're speaking my language!|Let me get in on that!
speak;Colm;Alright, you've got a deal, kid!|I'll teach you the best tricks I know!
